thread.title: Microsoft Dynamics® User Group Conference, Summit 2015, Announces Full Line-Up of Partner Sponsors
thread.title_full: Microsoft Dynamics® User Group Conference, Summit 2015, Announces Full Line-Up of Partner Sponsors

author: admin
title: Microsoft Dynamics® User Group Conference, Summit 2015, Announces Full Line-Up of Partner Sponsors
text:
Dynamic Communities Inc. 
TAMPA, Fla., Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Dynamic Communities Inc., the supporting organization behind the official user groups for Microsoft Dynamics® AX, Microsoft Dynamics® GP, Microsoft Dynamics® CRM, and Microsoft Dynamics® NAV is pleased to announce all sponsorship options are sold out for the annual user conference, Summit 2015. The conference, which will be held October 13-16 in Reno, NV, is expected to attract more than 3,000 Dynamics professionals. 
"We would like to extend a heartfelt thank you to our sponsors for Summit 2015," said Janet Lampert, President and COO of Dynamic Communities Inc. "The fact that we are sold out of sponsorship opportunities proves the value of this event for both the Dynamics Partner and User communities." 
The sponsor level packages offered for Summit 2015 included Premier, Platinum, Gold, and Exhibitor. The following companies are the Premier sponsors for each of the User Groups: 
AXUG: Data Masons, Fastpath, Solver 
CRMUG: Cincom, Experlogix, Rockton Software 
GPUG: Fastpath, Metaviewer, Rockton Software 
NAVUG: Data Masons, Lanham Associates, Sologlobe 
For a complete list of 2015 sponsors, please visit the 2015 Sponsors webpage on each Summit website: AXUG Summit Sponsors , CRMUG Summit Sponsors , GPUG Summit Sponsors , and NAVUG Summit Sponsors . 
Summit provides over 700 hands-on, role-based learning sessions for Dynamics users to enhance their skills, solve issues and learn best practices. In addition, attendees are able to network with their peers, Microsoft MVPs and Microsoft representatives. Summit also provides additional skill development opportunities through hands-on Academy Pre-Conference Training sessions. 
Dynamics Partners will be able to secure their sponsorship for Summit 2016 during the Summit 2015 event in Reno-Tahoe. For 2016 Summit sponsorship opportunities, contact nancy.anello@dynamiccommunities.com . 
About Dynamic Communities Inc: Dynamic Communities Inc. (DCI) is the supporting organization behind the Dynamics AX User Group ( AXUG ®), the Dynamics CRM User Group ( CRMUG ®), the Dynamics GP User Group ( GPUG ®), and the Dynamics NAV User Group ( NAVUG (TM)). Dynamic Communities is independent from Microsoft; however, its close working relationship positions the user groups to be a collective voice to Microsoft on user concerns, needs, and requests. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/microsoft-dynamics-user-group-conference-summit-2015-announces-full-line-up-of-partner-sponsors-300149541.html 
SOURCE Dynamic Communities Inc.
